misc.text: Everything you need to know about the wedding

info.name: Information
info.description: Pre-drinks are served at the pillared stairs at 3:45 p.m. and the wedding takes place at 4 p.m.

dresscode.name: Dress code
dresscode.description: Suit. We think you are wonderful just the way you are, the most important thing is that you feel comfortable.

children.name: Children
children.description: Children are wonderful, but on this day we choose to celebrate in the company of adults. Babies who are breastfed and cannot be left with a babysitter are of course welcome.

gifts.name: Gifts
gifts.description: The best gift is that we get to celebrate our day together with you. But if you still want to pay attention to our day with a gift, we appreciate a contribution to our honeymoon.

rsvp.name: RSVP
rsvp.description: RSVP by January 31st, 2024. You do this by filling out the form below.

location.name: Location
location.description: The wedding will take place in the botanical garden by the Pillar Stairs. The wedding party will be held in the Orangery.

language.name: Byta språk?
language.description: Vill du byta språk på sidan? Tryck på knappen nedan.

toastmastersSection.title: Meet our toastmasters
toastmastersSection.paragraph: Do you have any questions or concerns don't hesitate to contact any of our toastmasters.

misc.title: R.S.V.P
misc.description: Fill in the form once per guest.

allergies/preferences.name: Allergies / preferences
allergies/preferences.placeholder: If you dont' have any allergies or preferences you can leave this field empty.

speech.text: I wish to give a speech.

errors.wrong: The field is filled in incorrectly
